results.title: Life begins. - Episode 3.
results.brief_description: Illustrates the difference between males and females and explains how conception takes place. Shows a naked family playing on a beach to illustrate how the sexually mature and immature differ. Briefly addresses menstruation.

results.title: Someone new (episode 2)
results.brief_description: Shows the growth of a baby and the birth. These events take place within the lives of three families and the birth as shown as happy and relaxed. The birth of kittens and puppies is also shown to further explain what happens when someone new is born.

results.title: Growing
results.brief_description: This program shows how babies grow from infancy to adulthood. Highlights the changes that occur during babyhood, childhood and puberty. Provides interviews with adolescents to emphasize the emotional and physical changes that occur at puberty.

results.title: Story of the Cat
results.creator_credit: Bob Nagel and International Film Bureau
results.brief_description: A well paced tale of a once curious and exciting cat who becomes content, complacent and boring with age. A simple but eloquent statement on the norms of this world.

results.title: Romeo and Juliet (Royal Ballet)
results.creator_credit: Colin Nears, Kenneth MacMillan, BBC-TV, National Video Corporation and Royal Opera House Covent Garden

results.title: Peer pressure: nobody tells me what to do
results.brief_description: Gary, an adolescent boy, wishes he was more like the school tough guys. However, a series of events involving shoplifting and breaking and entering help him to realize that he was in the right track to begin with

results.title: Peer pressure: learning to be yourself
results.creator_credit: Renee Ross, Greg Logan and Barr Films
results.brief_description: A fifteen-year-old girl learn to understand how she allows peer pressure to affect her life. Insecure and hoping for acceptance, she acts accordingly to gain approval. Her older brother helps her recognize that she should be paying more attention to her own feelings when makng decissions. Defines and discusses the more subtle types of peer pressure.

results.title: Ocean challengers
results.creator_credit: David Perry, Brian Morris and Soundsense Film Productions
results.brief_description: Traces the epic voyage of the First fleet and contrasts it with the journey of group of adolescents who were prize-winners in an essay competition about the First Fleet. The students sailed from North Queensland to Sydney Harbour as crew members of a schooner.
